test_run_id.description: The ID of the test run to be stopped

$block: Summary single test run on Xamarin Test Cloud

$ul: **appVersion**: The compiled version of the app binary
**date**: The date and time the test was uploaded
**description**: Human readable explanation of the current test status
**id**: The unique id of the test upload
**platform**: The device platform targeted by the test. Possible values are 'ios' or 'android'
**resultStatus**: The passed/failed state
**runStatus**: The current status of the test run, in relation to the various phases
**state**: Deprecated. Use runStatus instead.
**stats**: Summary single test run on Xamarin Test Cloud
**devices**: Number of devices running the test
**devicesFailed**: Number of failed devices
**devicesFinished**: Number of finished devices
**failed**: Number of failed tests
**passed**: Number of passed tests
**peakMemory**: The max amount of MB used during the test run
**skipped**: Number of skipped tests
**total**: Number of tests in total
**totalDeviceMinutes**: The number of minutes of device time the test has been runnign
**status**: Deprecated. Use resultStatus instead.
**testSeries**: The name of the test series with which this test upload is associated
**testType**: The name of the test framework used to run this test
